altername_name: The Devouring of Heaven and Earth II: Battle of Red Cliffs
Tenchi o Kurau 2: Sekiheki no Tatakai
Tenchi wo Kurau II: Sekiheki no Tatakai
name: Tenchi o Kurau II: Sekiheki no Tatakai
overview: Tenchi wo Kurau II is the sequel to Tenchi wo Kurau, known as Dynasty Wars in English speaking territories. Had the Saturn version been released in English speaking territories, Tenchi wo Kurau II would have likely used the name Warriors of Fate, used in the arcade version of the game. Both games are based on the Tenchi wo Kurau manga series which ran for a brief period between 1983 and 1984.
